TitleEnglish: The Garden of Sinners - Remix: Gate of Seventh Heaven
SummaryEnglish: Extracts the key themes and scenes from first six movies  in chronological order, beginning from the 2nd movie, followed by the 4th, 3rd, 1st, 5th and 6th. A mixture of mostly existing scenes, and some new scenes.
Aliases: Kara no Kyoukai Remix: Gate of Seventh Heaven
